RODD & GUNN

New Zealand-based Rodd & Gunn, established in 1987, creates classics that are imbued with contemporary style and designed to stand the test of time. The brand is synonymous with uncompromising quality and is known for its traditionally tailored shirts, premium knitwear, well-fitting pants and jeans, classic polo shirts, Italian leather shoes, handmade leather luggage and stylish accessories.

name: Armstrong 750 Fill Power Down Jacket
description:
Size Info

True to size.
Considered a Slim fit; fitted through the chest, armholes and sides.

Details & Care

You'll be plenty warm throughout the year with the 750-fill-power duck down inside this ultralight nylon hooded jacket. This one's ideal for adventure-seekers who need a packable, convertible style that compresses into a travel pillow. With fleece-lined pockets to warm the hands quickly and adjustable drawcords at the hood, you can be ensured cozy comfort that blocks chilly winds and cold fronts as you go.

28" front length; 31" back length (size Medium)
Two-way front-zip closure with snap placket
Stand collar; adjustable drawstring down-filled hood
Recessed Power Stretch® cuffs with thumbhole construction lock in heat and keep sleeves in place during active use
Front zip-welt pockets; interior pockets; security pocket that doubles as a pack pocket
Articulated sleeves and underarm gussets enhance fit and add range of motion
Cordura® fabric on elbows, shoulders, cuffs and pockets for added durability at high-abrasion areas
Reflective details at back for visibility for low-light conditions
Lined, with 750-fill-power down
100% nylon
Machine wash, tumble dry
Made in Canada
Item #5791376

name: Hybridge ™ Lite 800 Power Fill Down Jacket
description:
Details & Care

With an ultralight construction and glossy quilted channels, this 800-fill-power down-insulated jacket in a hip-length provides incredible warmth while maintaining a sleek fit. Flexible side panels ensure maximum comfort and ease of movement, whether you're hiking a snow-covered trail or hitting the slopes.

26" length (size Medium)
Two-way front-zip closure
Stand collar
Stretch cuffs with thumbholes
Front zip pockets; interior mesh pockets; self-packable into exterior right pocket.
Reflective details enhance visibility in low light or at night
Lined, with 800-fill down insulation
100% nylon with 55% polyester, 39% nylon, 6% elastane contrast.
Machine wash, tumble dry
Made in Canada
Men's Clothing
Item #6142517

name: Insulated Water Resistant Car Coat
description:
Size Info

True to size.
Considered a Regular fit; cut with a little extra room through the chest and body for comfort.

Details & Care

This rugged, dependable coat is durably constructed without skimping on the details. Because it's water-resistant, a sudden rain won't dampen your mood or style. It also includes a zip-detachable hood for when you need some coverage overhead. A quilted poly-fill lining keeps the body nice and warm, and supple faux-leather trim put a luxe finish on the cool-weather design.

36" length (size Medium).
Front covered snap and zip closure.
Chest zip pocket; front flap pockets.
Adjustable drawstring waist customizes the fit.
Fully lined, with 100% polyester fill.
100% polyester with 100% polyester faux-leather trim.
Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.
By Cole Haan; imported.
Men's Sportswear.

name: Hybridge 750 Fill Power Down Jacket
description:
Details & Care

Meet nature's challenges with the updated protection and comfort of the iconic Hybridge jacket, now featuring a Cordura® shell and Thermal Mapping® technology. The durable, abrasion- and tear-resistant exterior features articulated construction for full range of motion, and the 750-fill-power insulation is mapped for maximum warmth where it's most needed and minimized in areas prone to overheating for improved overall comfort.

25 1/2" length (size Medium)
Two-way front-zip closure with chin guard and interior storm flap
Stand collar
Recessed Power Stretch® cuffs lock in warmth and enhance fit
Chest zip pocket; front zip pockets; interior drop-in mesh pocket
Interior backpack straps allow jacket to be carried hands-free over shoulders
Reflective details enhance visibility in low light or at night
Thermal Mapping® technology provides warmth where you need it, while areas prone to overheating feature breathable fabrics
Strategically placed dynamic knit fabric at flex points for added range of motion, enhanced fit and breathability
Lined, with 750-fill-power down
100% polyamide with 47% polyester, 37% nylon, 16% elastane contrast
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Men's Clothing
Item #6119886

No matter if you'll be cheering from the stands, at home, or just going about your day, sport this jacket and show your support for all of the Indianapolis Colts players who have provided you with countless memories year after year.

name: Arctic Triclimate ® Waterproof 3-in-1 Down Jacket
description:
Details & Care

A jacket made with a durable DryVent® 2L seam-sealed shell offers premium waterproof protection with regulated breathability and enhanced comfort. The season-changing style integrates a fully adjustable hood and a zip-in quilted jacket, so you'll always look cool while feeling toasty warm. Remove or pile on the layers as needed in whatever conditions Mother Nature throws your way.

Outer shell: 75-denier 133 g/m² DryVent 2L fabric with non-PFC durable water-repellent (non-PFC DWR) finish
Inner jacket: 50-denier 78 g/m² plain weave with non-PFC DWR finish
Inner jacket is lined with 550-fill-power down
100% recycled polyester
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Certified to the Responsible Down Standard (RDS) by Control Union
PFC-free, durable water-repellent coating is free of per- and poly-fluorinated chemicals, some of which can be harmful to the environment
This product meets Nordstrom Sustainably Sourced Materials criteria: contains at least 50% sustainably sourced materials

name: ACG Therma-FIT Wolf Tree Graphic Hoodie
description:
Size Info

Regular fit; a slimmer athletic cut that delivers better mobility by eliminating the bulk of extra fabric.

Details & Care

This pullover hoodie that keeps the elements at bay is brightened with a rubbed rock print inspired by Wolf Creek, a trail that follows the Crooked RIver in central Oregon. The Therma-FIT technology helps manage your body’s natural heat to help keep you warm in cold-weather conditions. It combines with Polartec®, an ultrasoft fleece that helps hold warm air in while letting moisture escape to help keep you dry.

Fixed three-panel hood
Elastic binding at cuffs and hem
Therma-FIT microfiber fleece offers superior protection against wind and cold with minimal weight and bulk
100% polyester
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Nordstrom x Nike: A curated lifestyle destination where fashion is the ultimate sport

name: Butte 3-in-1 Down Parka with Genuine Shearling Trim
description:
Details & Care

A parka that offers more than just coverage and style, this three-in-one piece is designed to protect from everything—rainstorms to arctic chills. Sleek and breathable fabric provides protection from rain and snow, while two layers of quilting hold pillows of light, core-warming down fill. Soft, wispy genuine shearling provides extra insulation along the roomy hood, and the bottom down layer can be removed for less bulk or worn alone as a vest.

34" coat length; 25" vest length (size Medium)
Front zip closure with snap storm flap
Stand collar
Attached hood with removable genuine Toscana shearling-fur (Spain or Turkey) trim
Chest hand-warmer pockets with polar-fleece lining; front flap-patch pockets; interior zip pocket with media outlet
Waterproof zippers
Water-resistant
Removable vest liner, with down fill
85% polyester, 15% cotton
Dry clean
Imported
Item #5951575

name: Men's Sportswear Storm-FIT City Series Hooded Down Parka
description:
Details & Care

Be ready for any weather in this high-performance down jacket finished with the Storm-FIT treatment to achieve a wavy, agitated design unique to each coat. The double-layered shell features reinforcement in high-wear areas, and the knee-length hem adds protection against cold winds. Throw in several secure zip-closure pockets and duel-entry flap front pockets, plus a range of adjustable details, and you've got a coat that gets the job done no matter what.

Two-way front-zip closure
Stand collar; adjustable hood
Adjustable hook-and-loop cuffs
Front zip pockets; dual-entry flap pockets
Reflective details enhance visibility in low light or at night
Lined, with down fill
100% nylon
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Nordstrom x Nike: A curated lifestyle destination where fashion is the ultimate sport

SACAI

Japanese brand Sacai was launched in Tokyo by designer Chitose Abe in 1999. The label makes clothing, shoes and accessories for women and men that incorporate the idea of hybrids. Sacai styles combine contrasting textures, mixing knits with delicate woven materials to reinterpret patterns and transform pieces into unexpected forms and silhouettes.

This quarter-zip pullover also feels super soft with the added touch of understated Virginia Tech Hokies graphics.
